EmailTemplate.subject: Are You Prepared for Unscheduled Maintenance?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your aircraft is a great investment - an investment worth protecting. Honeywell's Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) is the perfect solution for fixed-wing operators who want to keep their aircraft flying and control their annual maintenance budget.
Backed by over 40 years of expertise, MSP offers:
- Maximum aircraft dispatchability based on broad coverage of avionics & mechanical products - A proven pedigree of expert support - well recognized across the industry - Selectable options that support tailored programs - Stable, predictable cost that enable financial planning and financial predictability - Increased aircraft value - Protection for your investment with genuine Honeywell parts - Options for targeted obsolescence coverage and consigned inventory for a faster turn time
Remove the financial uncertainty and gain peace of mind knowing your aircraft is covered by a program that protects more than 3,800 aircraft worldwide! Contact Corporate Jet Support today to request a quote.
